column1: Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) size (128, 256, 1) capture representing the head of a man aged  of 37 years old, with a sequence weighted in T2 and sagittal section, starting from the right hemisphere of the skull. The observed details include the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 5240.4785 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 5608.3008 mm³, the temporal horn of right lateral ventricle of volume 11.8652 mm³, the white matter of right hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 210.9375 mm³, the right cerebellar cortex of volume 1547.7539 mm³, the right putamen of volume 5.2734 mm³, the right hippocampus of volume 159.5215 mm³ and the right amygdala of volume 1.3184 mm³.
